main event: A sighting of one round, transparent object resembling a basketball occurred in Livingston Manor, N.Y. on August 7, 1957.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for one hour and the object was still in sight during that time., The object was observed at altitudes of 12,000 to 33,000 feet by different witnesses., It was reported that one witness initially noticed the object while looking up., Some witnesses used binoculars to observe the object., The reporting officer and one observer suspected the object to be a weather balloon.
witness description: civilians in the area, including an engineer
